meanings.definition: To examine thoroughly and make necessary repairs or adjustments.
meanings.sent1: I need to overhaul my bicycle before the race.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic will overhaul the engine of the car.
meanings.sent3: Why did the bicycle go to therapy? It needed an overhaul!
meanings.sent4: She decided to overhaul her life like a mechanic fixing a car.
meanings.sent5: The idea of an overhaul made the bicycle look brand new.

meanings.definition: A thorough examination and repair of a vehicle or machine.
meanings.sent1: The car is in the shop for an overhaul.
meanings.sent2: The factory does an overhaul of all machines every year.
meanings.sent3: Why did the mechanic break up with the car? It needed too many overhauls!
meanings.sent4: The overhaul of the machine was like a doctor's check-up.
meanings.sent5: The overhaul of the vehicle made it run smoothly again.

meanings.definition: To make extensive changes or improvements to something.
meanings.sent1: We need to overhaul our website to attract more visitors.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to overhaul its marketing strategy.
meanings.sent3: Why did the old house get a makeover? It needed an overhaul!
meanings.sent4: She wanted to overhaul her wardrobe like a fashion designer.
meanings.sent5: The overhaul of the system brought about positive changes.
